articles.author: Samuel Bannister
articles.title: Erling Haaland leaves Man City in distress as Barcelona create cunning plan to sign striker - TEAMtalk
articles.description: Man City are vulnerable to losing their superstar striker for just over £150m if they're not careful - meaning they must accelerate any plans to renew his contract
articles.content:
Barcelona are preparing to compete for the signing of Erling Haaland from Manchester City, according to a report – but not next year.
Haaland enjoyed a thrilling debut season with Man City, winning … [+2652 chars]
